books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.text: The story, told by the six-year-old Jean Louise Finch, takes place during three years (1933â€“35) of the Great Depression in the fictional town of Maycomb, Alabama, the seat of Maycomb County.

books.author: George Orwell
books.text: The story takes place in an imagined future, the year 1984, when much of the world has fallen victim to perpetual war, omnipresent government surveillance, historical negationism, and propaganda.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.text: The story primarily concerns the young and mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and his quixotic passion and obsession with the beautiful former debutante Daisy Buchanan.
